explanation: [0-0] A little boy wearing a yellow hat and red glasses is standing by the window, his right hand resting on the window frame, gazing outside. The walls of the room are light blue, and there is a white radiator next to the window.

[0-6] The little boy closes the window with his right hand, then turns his head to the left, looking forward with a pout, appearing unhappy. Then the scene switches to a young woman, with a green curtain in the background. The woman, wearing a yellow top and dark blue pants with a red hat, is adjusting a mobile phone on a tripod. The woman then looks up, with a puzzled expression on her face. The scene then cuts back to the little boy, who is shaking the window back and forth with both hands, his mouth open and a worried expression on his face. The scene then cuts to the young woman in the yellow top, standing behind the phone stand, bending forward with her hands outstretched, revealing a helpless expression. Then the camera zooms in, and you can see the woman frowning with her eyes looking forward. The scene then cuts back to the little boy in the room, who continues to shake the window with both hands, talking.
